code: import axios from"axios";const apiURL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export const getSingleProduct=async pId=>{try{let res=await axios.post("".concat(apiURL,"/api/product/single-product"),{pId:pId});return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const postAddReview=async formData=>{try{let res=await axios.post("".concat(apiURL,"/api/product/add-review"),formData);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const postDeleteReview=async formData=>{try{let res=await axios.post("".concat(apiURL,"/api/product/delete-review"),formData);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};
